decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: 0251-001 Rev P1 (Location Plan); 0251-002 Rev P1 (Existing Block Plan); 0251-003 Rev P2 (Proposed Block Plan); 0251-100 Rev P1 (Existing and Proposed Ground Floor Plans); 0251-0110 Rev P2 (Existing and Proposed First Floor Plans); 0251-120 Rev P2 (Proposed Second Floor Plan); 0251-130 Rev P2 (Existing and Proposed Roof Plans); 0251-200 Rev P1 (Existing and Proposed Front Elevations); 0251-210 Rev P1 (Existing and Proposed Rear Elevations); 0251-220 Rev P1 (Existing and Proposed Side Elevation).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the flat roof(s) of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with Policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).

| The proposed second floor side elevational window of the hereby approved development shall at no time be openable or glazed, otherwise than in obscured glass, below a minimum height of 1.7 metres (5'7") above the relevant floor level.

Reason: To ensure that the proposed development does not prejudice the amenities of adjoining occupiers, in accordance with policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18).
description: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of conservatory); first floor rear extension and alterations to side fenestration involving removal of door and window; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension, and installation of two rooflights to front roofslope
